__e: Mm. Just make sure you know the real reason you're doing something, or you'll fail before you start.
I have to try to make a success of something that I knew darn well was a failure from the very beginning.
I am responsible for you, and I am not prepared to send you into a situation that's primed for you to fail.
Only if we fail, and we're not going to fail.
But if they don't give me their all and if I don't give them mine, that is my failure and my disgrace.
